p: Plant terpenoids are widely used as deodorants due to their characteristic fragrance. Ammonia is responsible for a myriad of bad odors, including food waste, sweat, and urine, while isovaleric acid causes foot and age-related odors [ 24]. However, geraniol, found only in the hydrosol, is known as a fragrance compound [ 25]. Therefore, kuromoji hydrosol could be used to eliminate bad odors.
